A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm really shocked that this movie only got 59% on user critics. 
1. You are not a true Star Wars fan if you did not enjoy this movie because it brought back a lot of the originality of the original Star Wars trilogy\, which I found happily nostalgic. 
2. This movie is filled with badass actors that really live up to the force of the Star Wars movies. (Pun intended). 
3. Star Wars VIII: The Last Jedi exceeded my expectations. In a way\, it is somewhat easily tied to Empire Strikes Back because of how situations are faced and how it leaves you in wonder. It is filled with  great one-on-one character interactions\, punny jokes from time to time\, and action-packed fight scenes that leave you thinking "holy shit\, did that just happen?" Great movie. Loved it. Mind is blown because of its awesomeness. If you are a true Star Wars fan\, you will really appreciate The Last Jedi.
